column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When the pizzas came
column2: I honestly couldn't taste much of a difference between the two
column3: which was disappointing. The crust was thin
column6: but everything inside the pizza was lacking in flavor and slid off the crust. Nothing was adhered to anything else
column7: so eating it was strange and disconnected. The spinach in the pizza also caused it to be really watery.
